1.Title: Ten Ton Top
1.Description: Reduces DMG taken by <color=#2BAD00>7.5%</color>. After being attacked, the next attack to hit an enemy will trigger a critical hit and deal <color=#2BAD00>600%</color> of the equipper's DEF as additional DMG. This effect can be triggered once every 7.5s.
